title: Empowers the state liquor authority to authorize municipalities to restrict the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages upon proof that the hours impact crime rates
summary: Empowers the state liquor authority to authorize municipalities to restrict the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages within the municipality upon submission of proof that the hours of operation impact crime rates within the municipality.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to empowering the state liquor authority to authorize municipalities to restrict the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages within the municipality upon submission of proof that the hours of operation impact crime rates within the municipality
